languages.text: "Сообщение с сектором Каликсис очень нестабильно. Из кораблей, за последние годы нырнувших в {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зев{/g}, ни один пока не вернулся. Последний корабль, прибывший через Зев c той стороны, стал жертвой временной аномалии — прыжок отнял у них почти два десятка лет по времени {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реального мира{/g}".

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."
languages.original_text: "Сообщение с сектором Каликсис очень нестабильно. Из кораблей, за последние годы нырнувших в {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зев{/g}, ни один пока не вернулся. Последний корабль, прибывший через Зев c той стороны, стал жертвой временной аномалии — прыжок отнял у них почти два десятка лет по времени {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реального мира{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Out of the ships that have dived into the Maw over the recent years, none have yet returned. The visits we've had from the other side have also been suspiciously few in number. The last ship that came through the Maw was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in real world time."

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Out of the ships that have dived into the Maw over the recent years, none have yet returned. The visits we've had from the other side have also been suspiciously few in number. The last ship that came through the Maw was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in real world time."

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

"Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

languages.text: 「カリクシス星域との通信は非常に不安定だった。近年{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}にダイブした船で、戻ってきた船は一隻もない。最後にマウを通過した船は、一時的な異常に見舞われた…ジャンプに{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}時間でほぼ20年かかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: 「カリクシス星域との通信は非常に不安定だった。近年{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}にダイブした船で、戻ってきた船は一隻もない。最後にマウを通過した船は、一時的な異常に見舞われた…ジャンプに{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}時間でほぼ20年かかったのだ」

languages.text: “与卡利西斯星区的联系一直都非常不稳定。这几年来，进入{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}的船只，一艘都没有回来过，最后一艘从巨口那边过来的飞船，遭遇了时间紊流，那场亚空间跳跃在{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中耗去了近二十年的时间。”
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: “与卡利西斯星区的联系一直都非常不稳定。这几年来，进入{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}的船只，一艘都没有回来过，而从巨口那一边过来的舰船，数量也少得令人心生疑虑。最后一艘穿越巨口的飞船遭遇了时间紊流，那场亚空间跳跃在{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中耗去了近二十年的时间。”

languages.text: «Las comunicaciones con el sector Calixis han sido harto inestables. De las naves que se han adentrado en las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g} en los últimos años, no tenemos constancia del regreso de ninguna. La última nave que atravesó las Fauces desde el otro lado sufrió una anomalía temporal: el salto duró casi dos décadas en {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: «Las comunicaciones con el sector Calixis han sido harto inestables. De las naves que se han adentrado en las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g} en los últimos años, no tenemos constancia del regreso de ninguna. Las visitas que hemos recibido del otro lado también han sido sospechosamente escasas. La última nave que atravesó las Fauces sufrió una anomalía temporal: el salto duró casi dos décadas en {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}

languages.text: « Les communications avec le secteur Calixis sont particulièrement instables. Aucun des vaisseaux ayant plongé dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g} ces dernières années n'en est revenu. Le dernier à l'avoir franchie depuis l'autre côté a été victime d'une anomalie temporelle : son saut lui a pris près de vingt ans dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: « Les communications avec le secteur Calixis sont particulièrement instables. Aucun des vaisseaux ayant plongé dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g} ces dernières années n'en est revenu, et nous recevons très peu de visiteurs en provenance de l'autre côté. Le dernier vaisseau à avoir franchi la Gueule a été victime d'une anomalie temporelle : son saut lui a pris presque vingt ans dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. »

languages.text: "Die Kommunikation mit dem Calixis-Sektor ist extrem instabil. Von allen Schiffen, die sich in den letzten Jahren in den {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlund{/g} gewagt haben, ist noch kein einziges zurückgekehrt. Das letzte Schiff, das von der anderen Seite durch den Schlund kam, wurde von einer temporalen Anomalie getroffen – der Sprung dauerte fast zwanzig Jahre in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g}-Zeit."
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kommunikation mit dem Calixis-Sektor ist extrem instabil. Von allen Schiffen, die sich in den letzten Jahren in den {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlund{/g} gewagt haben, ist noch kein einziges zurückgekehrt. Und wir hatten auch verdächtig wenige Besuche von der anderen Seite. Das letzte Schiff, das durch den Schlund kam, wurde von einer temporalen Anomalie getroffen – der Sprung dauerte fast zwanzig Jahre in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g}-Zeit."

languages.text: "Calixis Sektörü ile iletişim son derece istikrarsızlaştı. Son yıllarda {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız'a{/g} dalan gemilerden hiç dönen olmadı. Ağız'ın ötesinden gelen son gemiye ise zamansal bir anomali çarptı, sıçrama {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzayda{/g} neredeyse yirmi yıl sürdü."
languages.original_text: "Communication with the Calixis Sector has been extremely unstable. Of the ships that have dived into the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g} in recent years, none have yet returned. The last ship that came through the Maw from the other side was struck by a temporal anomaly — the jump took almost two decades in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time."

traits.locale_text: "Calixis Sektörü ile iletişim son derece istikrarsızlaştı. Son yıllarda {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız{/g}'a dalan gemilerden hiçbiri henüz geri dönmedi. Ağız'ın ötesinden gelen son gemiye ise zamansal bir anomali çarptı, sıçrama {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzay{/g}da neredeyse yirmi yıl sürdü."
